channel.title: My private message glitches, super donators
channel.description:
My private message glitches for super donators. If you click private on your chat it disconnects you. It looks like this: [img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/196/0ohc.png[/img]
Also my crowns are up one line in the chat box, for yell and other things except chat: [img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/800x600q90/30/jxdp.png[/img]
As the owner if i pm someone it shows the super donator symbol. EDIT: I cannot for the life of me fix this, i've been working on it for two days now. Someone please help me.
I'm using deathlypvpz, there are no modicons in the cache unless it's called something different. I cannot find any crowns in the cache at all, i've looked through every sprite. I also need to add extreme donator but I can't find where to add it! Please help.

item.title: My private message glitches, super donators
item.dc:creator: @loganownsyou loganownsyou
item.description:
@loganownsyou wrote:

I’ve looked through client.java and I found the crowns for speaking but not for pm. Also I have no modicons or crowns in my cache. Help please!

Read full topic
item.source: My private message glitches, super donators

item.title: My private message glitches, super donators
item.dc:creator: @chieftrees chieftrees
item.description:
@chieftrees wrote:

client or server?
I’ve checked for cr2, cr3, img2 and img=2, found some stuff but none of it seems to correlate with my problem. How do I fix the donator pm freeze? Do you know what class/classes it would be in?

Read full topic
